summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2019 ENTEGRA CORNERSTONE MOTORHOME. WHILE DRIVING AT UNKNOWN SPEEDS, THE ENTRANCE DOOR FAILED TO CLOSE. THERE WERE NO WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE LOCAL DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND DID NOT ASSIST. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 7,000.
